mapper.select: SELECT S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID ZJQDID, S2001.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S2006.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) AND S2006.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} JOIN B_S2_001 S2001 ON S2001.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2001.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < NVL(S2001.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S2001.XLH IS NOT NULL AND S2001.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S2001.TBBS = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID,S2001.WZ

SELECT S2004.ID ZJQDID, S2004.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_004 S2004 LEFT JOIN （SELECT S200601.FXSJ_FZ, S200601.FXXH, S200601.F1_SJ_FZ, S200601.F1_XH, S200601.F2_SJ_FZ, S200601.F2_XH, S200601.F3_SJ_FZ, S200601.F3_XH, S200601.F4_SJ_FZ, S200601.F4_XH, S200601.APU_SJ_FZ, S200601.APU_XH, S200601.KCSJ FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S2006.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) AND S2006.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) S200601 ON S200601.KCSJ >= COALESCE(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
WHERE S2004.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S2004.YXBS = 1 AND S2004.XLH IS NOT NULL AND S2004.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COALESCE(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) <= #{maxKcsj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) > #{minKcsj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY S2004.ID, S2004.WZ

SELECT S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID ZJQDID, S2001.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) JOIN (SELECT S2004.BJH, S2004.XLH, S2004.ID, S2004.WZ, S2004.DPRTCODE, S2004.AZSJ, S200801.CX_SJ CCSJ, S2004.FJZCH FROM B_S2_00801 S200801 JOIN B_S2_004 S2004 ON S200801.ZT = 1 AND S200801.CX_ZJQDID = S2004.ID AND S2004.XLH IS NOT NULL AND S200801.MAINID = #{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) S2001 ON S2001.DPRTCODE = S2006.DPRTCODE AND S2001.FJZCH = S2006.FJZCH AND S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2001.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < NVL(S2001.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID,S2001.WZ

SELECT S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID ZJQDID, S2001.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) JOIN (SELECT S2002.BJH, S2002.XLH, S2002.ID, S2002.WZ, S2002.DPRTCODE, S2002.AZSJ, S2002.FJZCH, S2004.CCSJ FROM B_S2_00801 S200801 JOIN B_S2_002 S2002 ON S200801.ZT = 1 AND S200801.ZS_ZJQDID = S2002.ID AND S2002.XLH IS NOT NULL AND S200801.MAINID = #{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN B_S2_004 S2004 ON S2002.ID = S2004.ID ) S2001 ON S2001.DPRTCODE = S2006.DPRTCODE AND S2001.FJZCH = S2006.FJZCH AND S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2001.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < NVL(S2001.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) GROUP BY S2001.BJH, S2001.XLH, S2001.ID,S2001.WZ

SELECT S2004.BJH, S2004.XLH, S2004.ID ZJQDID, S2004.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) JOIN B_S2_004 S2004 ON S2004.DPRTCODE = S2006.DPRTCODE AND S2004.FJZCH = S2006.FJZCH AND S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND S2004.XLH IS NOT NULL AND S2004.ID = #{zjqdid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY S2004.BJH, S2004.XLH, S2004.ID,S2004.WZ

SELECT S2004.WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH, SUM(S200601.F1_SJ_FZ) F1_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F1_XH) F1_XH, SUM(S200601.F2_SJ_FZ) F2_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F2_XH) F2_XH, SUM(S200601.F3_SJ_FZ) F3_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F3_XH) F3_XH, SUM(S200601.F4_SJ_FZ) F4_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.F4_XH) F4_XH, SUM(S200601.APU_SJ_FZ) APU_SJ_FZ, SUM(S200601.APU_XH) APU_XH FROM B_S2_004 S2004 JOIN (SELECT S200601.FXSJ_FZ, S200601.FXXH, S200601.F1_SJ_FZ, S200601.F1_XH, S200601.F2_SJ_FZ, S200601.F2_XH, S200601.F3_SJ_FZ, S200601.F3_XH, S200601.F4_SJ_FZ, S200601.F4_XH, S200601.APU_SJ_FZ, S200601.APU_XH, S200601.KCSJ, S2006.DPRTCODE, S2006.FJZCH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S200601.KCSJ < #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12)) S200601 ON S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < (CASE WHEN #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) THEN #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ELSE COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) END) AND S2004.DPRTCODE = S200601.DPRTCODE AND S2004.FJZCH = S200601.FJZCH AND S2004.ID = #{zjqdid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY S2004.WZ

SELECT S2004.WZ, SUM(CASE WHEN S2004.WZ = 21 THEN S200601.F1_SJ_FZ WHEN S2004.WZ = 22 THEN S200601.F2_SJ_FZ WHEN S2004.WZ = 23 THEN S200601.F3_SJ_FZ WHEN S2004.WZ = 24 THEN S200601.F4_SJ_FZ WHEN S2004.WZ = 31 THEN S200601.APU_SJ_FZ ELSE 0 END) SJ, SUM(CASE WHEN S2004.WZ = 21 THEN S200601.F1_XH WHEN S2004.WZ = 22 THEN S200601.F2_XH WHEN S2004.WZ = 23 THEN S200601.F3_XH WHEN S2004.WZ = 24 THEN S200601.F4_XH WHEN S2004.WZ = 31 THEN S200601.APU_XH ELSE 0 END) XH FROM B_S2_004 S2004 JOIN (SELECT S200601.F1_SJ_FZ, S200601.F1_XH, S200601.F2_SJ_FZ, S200601.F2_XH, S200601.F3_SJ_FZ, S200601.F3_XH, S200601.F4_SJ_FZ, S200601.F4_XH, S200601.APU_SJ_FZ, S200601.APU_XH, S200601.KCSJ, S2006.DPRTCODE, S2006.FJZCH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S200601.KCSJ < #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12)) S200601 ON S200601.KCSJ >= NVL(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND S200601.KCSJ < (CASE WHEN #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) THEN #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ELSE COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) END) AND S2004.DPRTCODE = S200601.DPRTCODE AND COALESCE(S2004.AZSJ, TO_DATE('17900101000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) <= #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND COALESCE(S2004.CCSJ, TO_DATE('89991231235900', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) > #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND S2004.YXBS = 1 AND S2004.CJ = 1 AND S2004.WZ IN (21, 22, 23, 24, 31) AND S2004.FJZCH = S200601.FJZCH AND S2004.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S2004.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY S2004.WZ UNION ALL SELECT 11 WZ, SUM(S200601.FXSJ_FZ) FXSJ, SUM(S200601.FXXH) FXXH FROM B_S2_00601 S200601 JOIN B_S2_006 S2006 ON S200601.ZT = 1 AND S200601.MAINID = S2006.ID AND S2006.ZT IN (2, 12) AND S200601.KCSJ < #{jssj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE 1 = 1 AND S2006.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S2006.FJZCH = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY S2006.FJZCH, S2006.DPRTCODE
